1387510.name: Last Mortem
1387510.description:
Are you bored of modern FPS games? Do you hate pay-to-win mechanics? Want to have fun without spending a fortune? Welcome to Last Mortem!

Last Mortem is a fast-paced Multiplayer FPS Game that brings back the nostalgia of 2010s browser shooters! Play with bots or online with friends. Collect over 100 weapons and in-game items, compete for points, and climb to the top of the global leaderboards! Explore more than 10 maps, capture exciting gameplay moments, and become a legend!

No microtransactions, no paywalls, no toxic players!
Tons of content, fast-paced gameplay, and endless fun to cure your boredom!

What Last Mortem offers you:
  • Full AI bot matches or online Multiplayer gameplay
  • Over 100 fully collectible and unlockable weapons, items, and killstreaks
  • Stats and global Leaderboards to compete for legendary status
  • More than 10 detailed maps
  • Extremely simple controls and gameplay - jump in and play
  • Extremely fast progression!

Available Game Modes:
  • Gun Race
  • Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Occupation

Weapon Classes:
  • Assault - light combat rifles
  • Support - machine guns
  • Sniper - sniper rifles of all kinds
  • Demolitions - bazookas and grenade launchers
  • Secondary - SMGs, revolvers, and pistols
  • Melee - knives, swords, and other hand weapons
  • Lethal - grenades, molotovs
  • Non-Lethal - flashbangs, smoke grenades

Maps:
  • Favela - small, fast-paced map in Rio de Janeiro favela
  • Oil Rig - close-combat arena at sea
  • Barbados - large map with a pirate shipwreck on the beach
  • Dolina - small, fast-paced map in a snowy region
  • Tropical City - abandoned city arena
  • Factory - close-combat factory arena
  • Winter Mansion - Xmas themed map
  • Sand Storm - desert village arena
  • Jungle Strike - tropical jungle map
  • Naval Strike - huge island base map

Pluses of the Game:
  • Play with bots or combine them with online players
  • No microtransactions, paywalls, or other restrictions
  • Huge amount of content
  • Fast adaptation to simple gameplay controls
  • Small player-base community: Discord

Minuses of the Game:
  • This is a hobby project indie game; we used some assets, and you might encounter some bugs
  • Our online player base is very limited
  • You might not play the game for long periods daily, but it's perfect for killing some time with fun
